text: Hello, any experience/documentation for extracting contact stream activities into a 3rd party system? Was hoping to grab something like this and put into my 3rd party CRM
Ideally a webhook approach would suit me!?

Hiya, my travels have led me to using Zapier to listen to the "Last Page Viewed" status change, then pipe this to an Azure Function, which in turn stores them into an Azure table, then packages up the requests in batch for injection to the CRM. Seems to work for now, but super interested in any other approaches used.
